editorialNotes.standard: Create, edit, and view your documents on the go, and access them anytime from your device with this powerful wordsmithing app. Work from anywhere and let your work go everywhere you do.
editorialNotes.short: Create, edit and view your documents from your iPhone or iPad.

ios.subtitle: Chatbot built on top Al models

editorialNotes.standard: Whether you are tracking personal finances or you're a power spreadsheet user, Microsoft Excel will make compiling and visualizing data sleek and easy. Create workbooks and worksheets, use formulas and see your work in graphs with this powerful spreadsheet application.
editorialNotes.short: Create, edit and share your files from your iPhone or iPad.

editorialNotes.tagline: Work at home or on the go
editorialNotes.standard: Here’s a simple truth: We don’t work with documents on mobile the same way we do on desktop. So it makes sense that Microsoft reimagined Office for a uniquely mobile experience where being productive feels frictionless.

editorialNotes.short: Scan coursework and assignments easily with your camera and share as PDF files.
editorialNotes.tagline: Scan and share as PDF files
All your files in one place
editorialNotes.standard: For all its usefulness, the thing we appreciate most about this cloud-storage app is how little we have to think about it. Whatever we’re sharing or uploading, it all just works–seamlessly and effortlessly.
editorialNotes.short: All your files are safe in one place across all your devices.

editorialNotes.standard: Give your brain a break with this digital notepad for logging your thoughts. Create private pages for lists, diaries, and random thoughts, or shared ones to collaborate with friends and colleagues.

editorialNotes.standard: Need to create a high-impact presentation? Create, present and share your slides and polished decks with PowerPoint. Whether you are in the classroom, boardroom or home office, this tool can help you create high-quality presentations that look like they were designed by a professional.

editorialNotes.standard: Equal parts task manager and calendar, this app has helped us build a schedule that’s as productive as it is practical. And with apps for Apple Watch and Mac, it can help keep you on track wherever you go.

editorialNotes.standard: An automatic transcription app that transforms your audio into on-screen, searchable text. It also suggests keywords, which you can use to navigate through the recording when you play it back and transcribes from previously recorded audio.

editorialNotes.tagline: Tasks that keep you on track
editorialNotes.standard: A personal assistant for your brain. Refine your to-do list, prioritize your tasks on a chart, or use the built-in Pomodoro timer to keep you balanced between productivity and burnout.

Ditch your paper notebook for digital notes that can be easily searched, organised, and shared.
